chapter.title: 8. Compound time. 8th note, rest and note

sect1.para: In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced, as the result of tying a group of two 16th notes and one 8th with a group of a 8th note and two 16th notes. Note that in can also be written using a quarter note:

sect2.title: Lesson and note the differences
sect2.para: Note the difference between the first and the second measure. Note how it is formed when tying the two groups of the first measure.

sect2.title: Exercises
sect2.para:
Music Reading exercises Compound time. 8th note, rest and note Press 'Play' and lesson the rhythm. Train your ear and practise reading this rhythm. Exercise 1
- Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.

Music Reading exercises Compound time. 8th note, rest and note Press 'Play' and lesson the rhythm. Train your ear and practise reading this rhythm. Exercise 2
